name: pondweed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several types of wild plant that grow in pools and rivers: Exotic species like curly pondweed tend to be more aggressive than native aquatic plants. Pond weeds can quickly take over if they are not removed.
More examplesFewer examplesInvasive aquatic plants like curly-leaf pondweed will be tackled. This plant is a relative of freshwater pondweeds.The fish would devour the lake's pond weed.Every spring marks the return of pond weeds such as duckweed.
